## Using git

git is a command line version control system. We can use it from R Studio (via the "git pane" in the upper left) or from the command line (i.e. in the "Terminal Tab").

The steps to using git involve:

- Initiate a git repository
    git init
    or click the little box in R Studio
  
- Do your work (same as ever)
    add files
    edit files
    save files
    etc.

- **Add files you care about to the "stage"**
    git add yourfilename
    git add . (if you want to add everything)
    click to add to "stage" in R Studio

- **Commit your changes**
    click commit button in R Studio
    git commit -m "message"
